verbose_text: Although CD38 knockdown reduced CD38 + cells by only ~ 35% and did not significantly reduce IL-6, significantly suppressive effects on IL-12p40 cytokine secretion (27% decrease vs. DMSO, results normalized and combined from six experiments, n = 14) were observed.
evidence: CD38 knockdown reduced CD38 +  cells by only ~35%                      and did not significantly reduce IL-6
